General.Name: China Leadshine Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: China Leadshine Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells motion control equipment and components in China. The company offers AC servo drives and motors, low-voltage servo drives and motors; open-loop stepper driver and motor, and closed-loop stepper driver and motor. It also provides motion controller; motion control card, PLC, remote IO module, human-machine interface, and machine vision products. In addition, the company offers downstream equipment. The company serves manufacturing, semiconductor, photovoltaic, PCB/PCBA manufacturing, lithium battery, logistics, machine tools, packaging, industrial robots, and medical equipment sectors. China Leadshine Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
